ingredients.item: Juice and zest of ½ lemon

instructions.step: Place 20g of the butter in a pan over medium heat and add the shallots and garlic. Cook for a couple of minutes until soft with a little colour.
Add the vinegar and the wine and reduce by half. Add the remainder of the butter, a little at a time and whisk until the mixture has thickened.

Add the kale and stir until cooked through, about 2 minutes. Add the spinach and stir until cooked through, about 1 minute. Season with the lemon juice, lemon zest, salt and freshly ground pepper. Sprinkle over the pine nuts. Serve warm.
